original_title: WWE In Your House 15: A Cold Day in Hell
overview: A Cold Day In Hell features Hunter Hearst-Helmsley vs. Flash Funk, The Rock vs. Mankind and The Nation Of Domination vs. Ahmed Johnson. The Undertaker defends the WWE Championship against Stone Cold Steve Austin. Plus, Vader faces Ken Shamrock in a No Holds Barred match and more!
tagline: There's gonna be a whole lotta whoop-ass goin' on!
title: WWE In Your House 15: A Cold Day in Hell
